Title: Create Formula Field with Static Resource image, update Travel Approval Layout and 2 List Views
Functional Specifications:
In Dev1 follow requirements and specifications on Create Formula Fields


NOTE 1: Don't worry about the "project file downloads" since most of that we have already baked into our installed Metadata for Sprint 1.


Specifically for the StatusImages.zip file, you can download it from our Git Repo of Bootcamp Examples


NOTE 2: After step 9 on the requirements and specifications, make sure to set the radial "Treat blank fields as blanks" below your Formula


Bootcamp additional requirements:

> Once your new Status Indicator field is saved, add it to the Travel Approvals Lightning Dynamic Form beneath Status

> Also add it to both Travel Approval List Views after Status


Should have 7 Components in your Commit.


Promote/Deploy to DevMerge and QA; Back Promote to all "sibling" Dev Sandboxes

Title: Delete Social Security Number and Mother's Maiden Name Fields from Contact Object
Functional Specifications:
From Hotfix, we need to delete two fields from the Contact object that our Auditors have flagged as critical PII and PCI violations:

> Social Security Number

> Mother's Maiden Name


This Story requires a Destructive Change in all Environments in the Pipeline.


Should have 2 components in your Commit.


Promote/Deploy to Production and, once the Deployment Completes Successfully, immediately Back Promote to UAT, QA, DevMerge and all Dev Sandboxes


Finally, manually delete these 2 fields in the Hotfix Sandbox.
